code: import React from'react';import{FileText,Tag,TrendingUp}from'lucide-react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const NoteStats=_ref=>{let{stats}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"text-lg font-medium text-gray-900 mb-4",children:"Note Statistics"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"grid grid-cols-1 gap-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex items-center p-3 bg-blue-50 rounded-lg",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FileText,{className:"w-8 h-8 text-blue-600 mr-3"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-sm font-medium text-blue-900",children:"Total Notes"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-2xl font-bold text-blue-700",children:stats.totalNotes})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex items-center p-3 bg-green-50 rounded-lg",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Tag,{className:"w-8 h-8 text-green-600 mr-3"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-sm font-medium text-green-900",children:"Unique Tags"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-2xl font-bold text-green-700",children:stats.totalTags})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex items-center p-3 bg-purple-50 rounded-lg",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TrendingUp,{className:"w-8 h-8 text-purple-600 mr-3"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-sm font-medium text-purple-900",children:"Avg Notes/Day"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-2xl font-bold text-purple-700",children:stats.averageNotesPerDay})]})]})]})]});};export default NoteStats;
